compliance.fire: Fire strategy involves assessing compartmentation, protected routes, alarm integration, and passive/active systems. Include review of fire-stopping, passive protection, evacuation modelling and certification tracking.
compliance.structural: Structural considerations: load redistribution, reinforcement, survey of existing members, temporary works sequencing. Capture structural survey reports, design assumptions and temporary works registers.
compliance.access: Accessibility ensures inclusive design: wayfinding, tactile surfaces, lift provision, sanitary accommodation compliance. Maintain an accessibility checklist mapped to local statutory guidance.
compliance.energy: Energy & HVAC: efficient plant selection, commissioning, airflow balancing, IAQ, heat recovery, BMS tuning. Record commissioning certificates and performance benchmarks.
compliance.water: Water hygiene: legionella risk assessment, temperature control, regular flushing and monitoring regimes. Store risk assessments and ongoing monitoring logs.
compliance.waste: Waste & recycling: segregation strategy, responsible disposal tracking, circular material considerations. Track waste transfer notes and diversion metrics.
compliance.permits: Permits & notices: planning, building control, landlord approvals, statutory notifications and inspections. Maintain a master register with status, expiry and next actions.
compliance.digital: Digital records: asset tag inventory, O&M manual collation, lifecycle maintenance scheduling. Centralize asset tags and handover documentation for lifecycle planning.

expert.q.project_type: What type of project are you planning?
expert.help.project_type: Choose the general category that best describes your project. For example, if you're updating your kitchen cabinets and appliances, select 'Kitchen Remodel'.
expert.q.property_type: Is this for a home or an office?
expert.help.property_type: Let us know where the project is taking place. This helps us tailor the scope and requirements.
expert.q.has_design: Do you already have a design or layout plan?
expert.help.has_design: If you already have a floor plan, sketches, or design documents, select 'Yes'. Otherwise, choose 'No'.
expert.q.style_preference: Do you have a preferred design style?
expert.help.style_preference: You can mention styles like modern, industrial, Scandinavian, or traditional. This helps us understand your aesthetic preferences.
expert.help.need_plumbing: Plumbing work includes installing or moving sinks, toilets, showers, or pipes.
expert.q.budget: What is your estimated budget for this project?
expert.help.budget: Provide a rough estimate of how much you're planning to spend. This helps us match you with the right professionals.
expert.q.timeline: What is your ideal completion date?
expert.help.timeline: When would you like the project to be finished? This helps us plan availability and timelines.
expert.q.scope_notes: Any additional notes or goals for this project?
expert.help.scope_notes: Feel free to share any specific goals, concerns, or ideas you have for your project.
expert.q.electrical_work: Will your project require electrical work?
expert.help.electrical_work: Electrical work includes installing outlets, lighting fixtures, rewiring, or upgrading panels.
expert.q.flooring_type: What type of flooring do you prefer?
expert.help.flooring_type: Choose the flooring material that best suits your space and budget.
expert.q.lighting_needs: Do you have specific lighting needs?
expert.help.lighting_needs: Describe any preferences for ambient, task, or accent lighting.
expert.q.ventilation: Is ventilation a concern for this project?
expert.help.ventilation: Ventilation is important for bathrooms, kitchens, and enclosed spaces.
expert.q.need_ac: Do you need air conditioning for this project?
expert.help.need_ac: Indicate whether you want supply, extension or upgrade of an air conditioning system.
expert.q.ac_type: Which type of air conditioning do you need?
expert.help.ac_type: Choose the AC system that best matches your needs. If unsure, select 'Not sure' and we'll follow up.
expert.q.permit_required: Do you know if your project requires a permit?
expert.help.permit_required: Some renovations require permits depending on local regulations.
expert.q.accessibility: Is accessibility a priority for this space?
expert.help.accessibility: Accessibility features include ramps, grab bars, and wide doorways.
expert.q.sustainability: Would you like to explore sustainable or eco-friendly options?
expert.help.sustainability: Eco-friendly options include energy-efficient appliances and recycled materials.
expert.q.contractor_preference: Do you have a preferred contractor or want recommendations?
expert.help.contractor_preference: Let us know if you already have someone in mind or need help finding one.
expert.help.timeline_flexibility: Flexible timelines may allow for better pricing and scheduling.
expert.q.budget_priority: What matters most: budget, speed, or quality?
expert.help.budget_priority: This helps us tailor recommendations to your priorities.
